message:
Won't help you build better mobile apps, but will help you develop a realistic set of expectations when building (or using) them..

name: Why mobile web apps are slow

description: I've had an unusual number of interesting conversations spin out of my previous article documenting that mobile web apps are slow.  This has sparked some discussion, both online and IRL.  But sadly...
